emptyState.title: No vendors configured
emptyState.description: Add vendor API integrations to start comparing prices

userFlows.name: Create List & Buy
steps: User opens app â†’ Home screen
Tap + button â†’ New List modal
Add items via text/voice/photo â†’ Grocery List screen
Review list (12 items) â†’ Tap Compare Prices
View optimal split (â‚¹482, save â‚¹38) â†’ Compare & Buy screen
Tap Buy from Optimal Split â†’ Checkout modal
Confirm payment â†’ Order confirmation
Orders appear in Order History â†’ Done

userFlows.name: Auto-Reorder Opt-In
steps: User receives push notification: 'Rice running low in 3 days'
Tap notification â†’ Home screen with AI Suggestions card
See 'Rice (3 days)' with Learn more link
Tap Learn more â†’ Auto-reorder explainer modal
Toggle 'Enable auto-reorder for Rice' â†’ Settings saved
48 hours before runout, receive notification: 'Rice will auto-order tomorrow'
User can cancel/snooze or do nothing
Order auto-executes â†’ Confirmation toast

userFlows.name: Bill Capture
steps: User forwards grocery bill email to bills@myhome.app
System receives email â†’ Extracts PDF attachment
OCR runs â†’ Parses vendor, date, items, amounts
Fuzzy match items to product catalog
User opens app â†’ Bills screen
See new bill: 'Oct 20 - Amazon â‚¹620 [Grocery]'
Tap bill â†’ View PDF + extracted items
User can edit/confirm items â†’ Save
Bill added to monthly spending chart
